original_text: Her family and the people who lived near her heard about her baby. They knew that the Lord had been very kind to her. They saw that she was happy. So they were happy too. Her family and the people who lived near her heard about her baby. They knew that the Lord had been very kind to her. They saw that she was happy. So they were happy too.
korean_text: 이웃과 친족이 주께서 그를 크게 긍휼히 여기심을 듣고 함께 즐거워하더라

sentences.original_text: Her family and the people who lived near her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 가족과 그녀 근처에 사는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: They knew that the Lord had been very kind to her
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주님이 그녀에게 매우 친절하셨다는 것을 알았습니다

sentences.original_text: They saw that she was happy
